showcases.title: Bitcoin Large OP Return Explorer
showcases.description: A comprehensive explorer for large OP_RETURN transactions on the Bitcoin blockchain. Features a timeline of transactions with detailed metadata, a search function, and a filter system to help you find the information you need.

showcases.title: Supply & Demand Economic Simulator
showcases.description: Comprehensive economic simulation showcasing market dynamics in a closed economy with 50 agents. Features real-time supply and demand curves, multiple economic scenarios (scarcity, abundance, tech boom, demand surge), market interventions (price floors/ceilings, taxes, subsidies), and a money printer mechanism. Watch producers, consumers, and traders interact through order books with detailed agent statistics, wealth inequality tracking, and exportable simulation data.

showcases.title: Galton Box Physics Simulation
showcases.description: Interactive physics simulation of Sir Francis Galton's bean machine demonstrating the Central Limit Theorem. Features real-time parameter adjustment for gravity, friction, bounce, ball/peg sizes, and spacing. Includes trail visualization, statistical tracking, and educational modal explaining the mathematical principles behind normal distribution emergence from random processes.

showcases.title: Bitcoin Strategic Reserve - US States Progress
showcases.description: The current progress of the Bitcoin Strategic Reserve in the United States (as of May 7, 2025)

showcases.title: Geo Economic Simulator - Claude 3.5 Sonnet
showcases.description: A simulation of a global economy over time, with a focus on the relationship between GDP, population, and resource availability.

showcases.title: Social Security Scenario Simulator
showcases.description: Comprehensive Social Security benefits calculator with break-even analysis. Input your earnings history to see monthly benefits at different retirement ages (62-70), compare lifetime totals with COLA adjustments, and analyze investment scenarios. Features detailed year-by-year projections, visual break-even point detection, and CSV export for financial planning.

showcases.title: Last Stack Standing - Money Printer Simulation
showcases.description: Educational simulation demonstrating how the ability to create money provides unfair advantages in competitive environments. Compare fair play vs. money printer modes through dice-based chip games with escalating stakes. Features real-time visualization of win distributions and chip flow analysis across multiple game simulations.

showcases.title: Water Cycle Simulation - Claude 3.5 Sonnet
showcases.description: A simulation of rainfall and evaporation across various altitudes.

showcases.title: 3D Interactive PhotoCube
showcases.description: A WebGL-powered 3D photocube with interactive controls and animations.

showcases.title: FPS Photo Realm
showcases.description: Walk around through a WebGL rendered world built of your own Photos and Art

showcases.title: Sierpinski Generator
showcases.description: Learn how a series of random outcomes can generate a fractal pattern.

showcases.title: Multi 3D Interactive PhotoCubes
showcases.description: A WebGL-powered Array of 3D photocubes with interactive controls and animations.

showcases.title: Geo Economic Simulator - Gemini Pro Created
showcases.description: A simulation of a global economy over time, with a focus on the relationship between GDP, population, and resource availability.

showcases.title: Geo Economic Simulator - Manus Created
showcases.description: A simulation of a global economy over time, with a focus on the relationship between GDP, population, and resource availability.

showcases.title: Massive Tree Viewer
showcases.description: Interactive particle system with physics simulation using Canvas API.

showcases.title: Particle System
showcases.description: Interactive particle system with physics simulation using Canvas API.

showcases.title: GL Shaders
showcases.description: WebGL Shader Demonstration with lots of configurable tweaks to play with.

showcases.title: SVG Animation
showcases.description: Complex SVG animations with morphing and path animations.
